DOC.brief_summary: The study combination outpatient inpatient monitoring . During 27-day inpatient portion study , individual 's sleep-wake schedule vary daily . Volunteers randomize regular irregular inpatient schedule .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Sleep Regularity Circadian Rhythms , Learning , Performance , Mood
DOC.criteria: healthy BMI 18.5 29.5 medication recent nightwork , shiftwork , travel across > 2 time zone use medication pregnant within 6 month postpartum
